env

Class Environment

  • java.lang.Object
    • env.Environment

  • public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object
    version 2 of the Environment for the distributed WUMPUS no other attributes than the one associated to the holes and treasures are activated
    Author:
    hc

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Environment.Couple<L,R> 
      static class  Environment.envComponent 
      static class  Environment.ENVtype
      Currently activated : DOROGOVTSEV, GRID ; _W means that wells are added ; _T means that treasures are added

      • generateGraph

        private static org.graphstream.graph.Graph generateGraph(Environment.ENVtype type,
                                                         int size)
        Parameters:
